gw.plugin.messaging

Interface MessageFinder


  • public interface MessageFinder
    Finder instance supplied to messaging integration code via MessageReply plugin. Used to look up messages for ack.
    Author:
    jseybold

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message findById(long messageID)
      Finds and returns a message from the local database given its ID.
      Message findBySenderRefID(java.lang.String senderRefID)
      Deprecated. 
      Please use findBySenderRefID(String, int) instead as there can be the same senderRefID for different destinations.
      Message findBySenderRefID(java.lang.String senderRefID, int destinationID)
      Finds and returns a message from the local database whose SenderRefID field contains senderRefID and whose destinationID field contains destinationID.
      MessageHistory findHistoryByOriginalMessageId(long originalMessageId)
      Finds and returns a message from the local database given its ID.
      MessageHistory findHistoryBySenderRefID(java.lang.String senderRefID, int destinationID)
      Finds and returns a message history from the local database whose SenderRefID field contains senderRefID.

    • Method Detail

      • findById

        Message findById(long messageID)
        Finds and returns a message from the local database given its ID. Returns null if no results are found.
        Parameters:
        messageID - ID of the message to return
        Returns:
        Message with the given ID, or null if none is found.

      • findBySenderRefID

        Message findBySenderRefID(java.lang.String senderRefID)
        Deprecated. Please use findBySenderRefID(String, int) instead as there can be the same senderRefID for different destinations.
        Finds and returns a message from the local database whose SenderRefID field contains senderRefID. If multiple matching messages are found, the one with the highest send order will be returned. Returns null if no results are found.
        Parameters:
        senderRefID - Sender reference of the message to return, which should have been set when the message was sent
        Returns:
        Message with the highest send order whose SenderRefID field contains senderRefID, or null if none is found.

      • findBySenderRefID

        Message findBySenderRefID(java.lang.String senderRefID,
                          int destinationID)
                   throws MultipleMatchesException
        Finds and returns a message from the local database whose SenderRefID field contains senderRefID and whose destinationID field contains destinationID. If multiple matching messages are found, an exception is thrown. Returns null if no results are found.
        Parameters:
        senderRefID - Sender reference of the message to return, which should have been set when the message was sent
        destinationID - Destination of the message.
        Returns:
        Message whose SenderRefID field contains senderRefID and whose destinationID field contains destinationID, or null if none is found.
        Throws:
        MultipleMatchesException

      • findHistoryByOriginalMessageId

        MessageHistory findHistoryByOriginalMessageId(long originalMessageId)
        Finds and returns a message from the local database given its ID. Returns null if no results are found.
        Parameters:
        originalMessageId - id of the original message
        Returns:
        Message History corresponding to the original message id.

      • findHistoryBySenderRefID

        MessageHistory findHistoryBySenderRefID(java.lang.String senderRefID,
                                        int destinationID)
        Finds and returns a message history from the local database whose SenderRefID field contains senderRefID. If multiple matches are found, the one with the highest send order will be returned. Returns null if no results are found.
        Parameters:
        senderRefID - Sender reference of the message to return, which should have been set when the message was sent
        destinationID - Destination of the message.
        Returns:
        Message History with the highest send order whose SenderRefID field contains senderRefID, or null if none is found.
